scripts.clean: npm run clean:npm && npm run clean:dist
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean:dist && npm run dist:dev
scripts.dist:dev: mkdir ../dist/pcba_dev && cp -fpR * ../dist/pcba_dev && cd ../dist/pcba_dev && npm run config:dev && tar -zcvf ../pcba_dev.tar.gz .
scripts.build:uat: npm run clean:dist && npm run dist:uat
scripts.dist:uat: mkdir ../dist/pcba_uat && cp -fpR * ../dist/pcba_uat && cd ../dist/pcba_uat && npm run config:uat && tar -zcvf ../pcba_uat.tar.gz .
scripts.config:uat: cp -fp config/uat/* config/ && rm -fr config/prod && rm -fr config/uat
scripts.build:preProd: npm run clean:dist && npm run dist:preProd
scripts.dist:preProd: mkdir ../dist/pcba_preProd && cp -fpR * ../dist/pcba_preProd && cd ../dist/pcba_preProd && npm run config:preProd && tar -zcvf ../pcba_preProd.tar.gz .
scripts.config:preProd: cp -fp config/preProd/* config/ && rm -fr config/prod && rm -fr config/preProd && rm -fr config/uat
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean:dist && npm run dist:prod
scripts.dist:prod: mkdir ../dist/pcba_prod && cp -fpR * ../dist/pcba_prod && cd ../dist/pcba_prod && npm run config:prod && tar -zcvf ../pcba_prod.tar.gz .
scripts.config:prod: cp -fp config/prod/* config/ && rm -fr config/prod && rm -fr config/uat
scripts.prebuild: npm run test # also runs npm run pretest
